description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of function f(x) = 4x + 3.
comments: n, 4*n+3, 16*n+15, 64*n+63 and 256*n+255 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..1000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(4*n+3) and IsPrime(16*n+15) and IsPrime(64*n+63) and IsPrime(256*n+255)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
